snippet: Pamela Rosenkranz’s show at the Miguel Abreu gallery combines serenity with sardonic analysis.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews works by Pamela Rosenkranz at Miguel Abreu gallery.
lead_paragraph: Pamela Rosenkranz’s show at the Miguel Abreu gallery combines serenity with sardonic analysis.
